title: Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula for Women | Natural Anti-Anxiety Supplement with Ashwagandha, GABA, Chamomile | Mood Support & Stress Management - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Perfect Harmony - Natural Stress Relief & Mood Support for Women

Find your balance with Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula, a comprehensive anti-anxiety and stress management supplement specifically designed for women. Our natural blend combines adaptogenic herbs, calming amino acids, and mood-supporting nutrients to help you manage stress, reduce anxiety, and promote emotional well-being.

Key Benefits

  • Reduces Stress & Anxiety: Ashwagandha and GABA work together to calm the nervous system and reduce stress response
  • Promotes Relaxation: Chamomile, Lemon Balm, and Passionflower provide natural calming effects without drowsiness
  • Supports Mood Balance: 5-HTP and L-Theanine support serotonin production for improved mood and emotional stability
  • Enhances Mental Clarity: Reduces brain fog and supports focus during stressful situations
  • Adaptogenic Support: Helps your body adapt to physical and emotional stressors
  • Non-Habit Forming: Natural ingredients provide gentle, effective stress relief without dependency

Powerful Stress-Relief Ingredients

  • Ashwagandha: Clinically-studied adaptogen that reduces cortisol levels and supports stress resilience
  • GABA (Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid): Calming neurotransmitter that promotes relaxation and reduces anxiety
  • Chamomile Extract: Traditional herb known for its calming and anti-anxiety properties
  • Lemon Balm: Supports calm mood and reduces nervous tension
  • Passionflower: Natural anxiolytic that promotes relaxation and restful sleep
  • L-Theanine: Amino acid that promotes alpha brain waves for calm alertness
  • 5-HTP: Precursor to serotonin that supports mood balance and emotional well-being
  • Magnesium: Essential mineral that supports nervous system function and muscle relaxation
  • B-Vitamin Complex: Supports energy metabolism and stress response

Who Should Use Perfect Harmony?

Ideal for women experiencing:

  • Daily stress and overwhelm
  • Occasional anxiety or nervousness
  • Difficulty relaxing or unwinding
  • Mood swings or irritability
  • Stress-related sleep issues
  • Work-life balance challenges

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily, preferably with meals. Can be taken in the morning for all-day stress support or in the evening for relaxation.

Quality Assurance: Made with premium herbs and nutrients. Non-GMO. No artificial additives or fillers.
shortDescriptionHtml: Find natural stress relief with Perfect Harmony. Our women's formula combines Ashwagandha, GABA, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, and Passionflower to reduce anxiety, promote relaxation, and support mood balance. Non-habit forming. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Calcium (as Calcium Carbonate) 18 mg 1%
Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine HCl) 1.8 mg 106%
Magnesium (as Magnesium Citrate) 13 mg 3%
Formula Proprietary Blend: 1071 mg **
L-Tryptophan, Valerian (Valeriana officinalis) (root), Goji (Wolfberry) (Lycium barbarum) (berry), Chamomile (Matricaria chamomilla) (flower), Lemon Balm (Melissa officinalis) (aerial), Passion Flower (Passiflora incarnata) (flower), L-Taurine, Hops (Humulus lupulus) (flower), St. John's Wort (Hypericum perforatum) (aerial), GABA (Gamma aminobutyric acid), Skullcap (Scutellaria baicalensis) (root), L-Theanine, Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) (root), Inositol, 5-HTP (Griffonia simplicifolia) (seed), Melatonin.

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Inactive Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Magnesium Stearate (Vegetable), Silicon Dioxide.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
